forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 58F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, with winds diminishing overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Partial clearing late. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
